channel.title: Why do I get this 1 error?
channel.description:
Error: loaderror Connecting to update server 60
Then it shows:
'Sorry, an error has occurred whilst loading RuneScape. To fix this blah blah blah'
Wtf did I do wrong? Everything used to work perfectly, I updated my Cache file, so I uploaded it and it should have worked... I had this error before, I don't remember what I did to fix it. Thanks anybody who helps.

item.title: Why do I get this 1 error?
item.dc:creator: @FinalFightPkz FinalFightPkz
item.source: Why do I get this 1 error?

item.title: Why do I get this 1 error?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

FinalFightPkz:

What did you change in your cache? Also did you delete your old cache? It wont download the new one if the old one is still there.

I added new items, I added the .dat files into the Raw folder, I can load it on the desktop client, but the webclient gives me that error.
Yeah, the old cache is deleted, and it downloads fine.

Read full topic
